name: HelpCRM
0:
”Alexa, open help c. r. m”
”brief me about product in CRM”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: help c. r. m
des: This Alexa skill will be used for helping the user to get a brief description about customer relationship management and its different features. You can just say Alexa open help customer relationship management and Alexa will give you detailed information about skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
